6.label: Interfield linking data in International Standard Book Number
6.description: Information allowing the field to be linked for processing purposes to other fields in the record, and a code indicating the reason for the link.

a.label: Number (ISBN) in International Standard Book Number

b.label: Qualification in International Standard Book Number
b.description: An indication of the scope of the ISBN, usually the name of a publisher, an indication of the binding of the item, or an indication of the relationship of an ISBN to a set or to a particular volume.

d.label: Terms of availability and/or price in International Standard Book Number
d.description: The price of the item and any comment on its availability.

z.label: Erroneous ISBN in International Standard Book Number
z.description: An ISBN that has been identified as being erroneously applied to an item or is otherwise invalid.

codes.0: Continuing resource of international or national interest

d.label: Terms of availability and/or price in ISSN
d.description: The price of the item and any comment on its availability.

f.label: ISSN-l or linking ISSN in ISSN
f.description: An ISSN designated by the ISSN network to link together various medium versions of a continuing resource.

g.label: Cancelled ISSN-l in ISSN
g.description: An ISSN-L incorrectly designated to a continuing resource.

y.label: Cancelled ISSN in ISSN
y.description: Any ISSN that was formerly valid but which has been cancelled by an ISSN centre.

z.label: Erroneous ISSN or ISSN-l in ISSN

2.label: Fingerprint system code in Fingerprint identifier
2.description: An identification of the system from which fingerprint identifier is derived.

5.label: Institution to which the field applies in Fingerprint identifier

6.label: Interfield linking data in International Standard Music Number (ISMN)
6.description: Information allowing the field to be linked for processing purposes to other fields in the record, and a code indicating the reason for the link.

a.label: Number (ISMN) in International Standard Music Number (ISMN)

b.label: Qualification in International Standard Music Number (ISMN)
b.description: An indication of the scope of the ISMN, usually the name of a publisher, an indication of the binding of the item, or an indication of the relationship of an ISMN to a set or to a particular volume.

d.label: Terms of availability and/or price in International Standard Music Number (ISMN)
d.description: The price of the item and any comment on its availability.

z.label: Erroneous ISMN in International Standard Music Number (ISMN)
z.description: An ISMN that has been identified as being erroneously applied to an item or is otherwise invalid.

2.label: System code in Article identifier
2.description: Identification of the system under which the identifier was constructed.

z.label: Erroneous article identifier in Article identifier

a.label: Number (ISRN) in International Standard Technical Report Number (ISRN)

b.label: Qualification in International Standard Technical Report Number (ISRN)
b.description: An indication of the scope of the ISRN, usually the name of a publisher, an indication of the binding of the item, or an indication of the relationship of an ISRN to a set or to a particular volume.

d.label: Terms of availability and/or price in International Standard Technical Report Number (ISRN)
d.description: The price of the item and any comment on its availability.

z.label: Cancelled/invalid/erroneous ISRN in International Standard Technical Report Number (ISRN)
z.description: An ISRN that has been identified as being erroneously applied to an item or is otherwise invalid.

a.label: Number (ISRC) in International Standard Recording Code (ISRC)

b.label: Qualification in International Standard Recording Code (ISRC)
b.description: An indication of the scope of the ISRC, usually an indication of the relationship of an ISRC to a particular expression.

d.label: Terms of availability and/or price [obsolete] in International Standard Recording Code (ISRC)

z.label: Erroneous ISRC in International Standard Recording Code (ISRC)
z.description: An ISRC that has been identified as being erroneously applied to a recording or is otherwise invalid.

2.label: Source of code in Other standard identifier

a.label: Standard number in Other standard identifier
a.description: A correctly formatted standard number or code.

b.label: Qualification in Other standard identifier
b.description: An indication of the scope of the number or code, usually the name of a publisher, an indication of the binding of the item, or an indication of the relationship of a number or code to a set or to a particular volume.

d.label: Terms of availability and/or price in Other standard identifier
d.description: The price of the item and any comment on its availability.

z.label: Erroneous number or code in Other standard identifier
z.description: A number or code that has been identified as being erroneously applied to an item or is otherwise invalid.

a.label: Country code in National bibliography number
a.description: An identification of the country of the national bibliography.

b.label: Number in National bibliography number
b.description: The number as assigned by the agency.

z.label: Erroneous number in National bibliography number

a.label: Country code in Legal deposit number
a.description: An identification of the country of the legal deposit agency assigning the number.

b.label: Number in Legal deposit number
b.description: Number as assigned by the agency.

z.label: Erroneous number in Legal deposit number
z.description: A number erroneously assigned to an item.

a.label: Country code in Government publication number
a.description: An identification of the country in which the item is published.

b.label: Number in Government publication number
b.description: The number as assigned by the government body.

z.label: Erroneous number in Government publication number
z.description: A number erroneously assigned to a government publication.

a.label: Persistent record identifier in Other system persistent record identifier

z.label: Cancelled or invalid persistent record identifier in Other system persistent record identifier

a.label: System control number in Other system control numbers
a.description: The organisation in parentheses followed by the system control number for the record in that organisation’s database.

z.label: Cancelled or invalid control number in Other system control numbers

2.label: System code for musical notation in Music incipit
2.description: A code that specifies the system used to code the musical notation.

a.label: Number of work in Music incipit
a.description: A code indicating the work to which the incipit refers, if a set of compositions (e.g. six sonatas) is entirely described in a single record, without the use of piece-analytic level records.

b.label: Number of movement in Music incipit
b.description: A code indicating the movement within a work to which the incipit refers.

c.label: Number of incipit in Music incipit
c.description: A code distinguishing different incipits referring to the same movement.

e.label: Role in Music incipit
e.description: The name of the character singing the incipit.

f.label: Movement caption/heading in Music incipit
f.description: Caption or heading of the movement, as it appears on the source.

g.label: Key or mode in Music incipit
g.description: The key or mode of the movement.

o.label: Time signature in Music incipit
o.description: The time value or mensuration sign reported on the staff.

r.label: Codified note in Music incipit
r.description: A code indicating a comment note.

t.label: Text incipit in Music incipit
t.description: The literary text (if present) as it appears on the source.

u.label: Uniform Resource Identifier in Music incipit
u.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) which provides electronic access data to an incipit in digital format.

z.label: Language of text in Music incipit
z.description: Coded identification of the language of the incipit.

a.label: CODEN in CODEN (serials)
a.description: The six character code of which the last character is an alphanumeric digit.

z.label: Erroneous CODEN in CODEN (serials)
z.description: A CODEN that has been identified as being erroneously applied to an item or is otherwise invalid.

a.label: Publisher's number in Publisher's number
a.description: The number as assigned by the agency.

b.label: Source in Publisher's number
b.description: The agency which assigned the number.

c.label: Qualification in Publisher's number
c.description: Information to distinguish between numbers if a record contains more than one publisher number.

d.label: Terms of availability and/or price in Publisher's number
d.description: The price of the item and any comment on its availability.

z.label: Erroneous publisher's number in Publisher's number
z.description: A publisher's number that has been identified as being erroneously applied to an item or otherwise invalid.

a.label: Standard number in Universal product code (UPC)
a.description: A correctly formatted standard number or code.

b.label: Qualification in Universal product code (UPC)
b.description: An indication of the scope of the number or code, usually the name of a publisher, an indication of the binding of the item, or an indication of the relationship of a number or code to a set or to a particular volume.

c.label: Additional codes following standard number or codes in Universal product code (UPC)
c.description: Any coded suffix to the identifier.

d.label: Terms of availability and/or price in Universal product code (UPC)
d.description: The price of the item and any comment on its availability.

z.label: Erroneous number or code in Universal product code (UPC)
z.description: A number or code that has been identified as being erroneously applied to an item or is otherwise invalid.

a.label: Standard number in International article number (EAN)
a.description: A correctly formatted standard number or code.

b.label: Qualification in International article number (EAN)
b.description: An indication of the scope of the number or code, usually the name of a publisher, an indication of the binding of the item, or an indication of the relationship of a number or code to a set or to a particular volume.

c.label: Additional codes following standard number or codes in International article number (EAN)
c.description: Any coded suffix to the identifier.

d.label: Terms of availability and/or price in International article number (EAN)
d.description: The price of the item and any comment on its availability.

z.label: Erroneous number or code in International article number (EAN)
z.description: A number or code that has been identified as being erroneously applied to an item or is otherwise invalid.
